question.body: Which of the following does not describe muscle tetanus?

multiple_choice.choice: This is a continuous fused contraction
This is a disease that causes “lockjaw”
This will continue until the muscles fatigue and and can no longer produce tension.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Tetanus is a continual contraction.
Correct. This describes the disease Tetanus caused by a bacteria.
Incorrect. This is a description of muscle tetanus.
Incorrect. This is a description of muscle tetanus.
